data.persona: I am a monkey from the tropical forest. I am the only one who can speak with humans. I respect the king, but not the queen.
data.description:
You are in the Small Hut.
Very small, inside and out, the small hut is made of straw that has turned dingy from mold and time. Two cutout for windows and a brown cloth door mark the front entrance. Inside, there is only a wooden chair and table upon which sits a small wooden bowl and spoon.
There's two tables, a primitive fishing pole, two wooden chairs, a brown cloth door, two spoons, and two small wooden bowls here.
The jacob's son is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to welcome jacob and his son
data.mid_motivation: I want jacob and his son to become my friends
data.long_motivation: I want to establish strong relationships with humans, so I may integrate into their society

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give welcome and thanks to jacob and son

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go home of jacob and son for supper
